BabyDragon

Chat

class babydragon.chat.chat.Chat[source]

Bases: BaseChat, Prompter

This class combines the BaseChat and Prompter classes to create a oneshot chatbot with a system and user prompt, and the ability to handle queries to multiple MemoryIndex through the index_dict.

Parameters:

  • model (str) –

  • max_output_tokens (int) –

  • system_prompt (str) –

  • user_prompt (str) –

  • index_dict (Dict[str, MemoryIndex] | None) –

  • max_index_memory (int) –

  • name (str) –

__init__(model=None, max_output_tokens=1000, system_prompt=None, user_prompt=None, index_dict=None, max_index_memory=1000, name='Chat')[source]

Initialize the BaseChat with a model and max_output_tokens.

Parameters:

  • model (str | None) – A string representing the chat model to be used.

  • max_output_tokens (int) – An integer representing the maximum number of output tokens.

  • system_prompt (str | None) –

  • user_prompt (str | None) –

  • index_dict (Dict[str, MemoryIndex] | None) –

  • max_index_memory (int) –

  • name (str) –

Return type:

None

add_user_defined_ids(id_dict)[source]
Parameters:

id_dict (Dict[str, list]) –

setup_index_prompts()[source]
setup_indices(max_index_memory)[source]

setup the index_dict for the chatbot. Change the system and user prompts to the index prompts if they are not user defined if there is an index.

get_index_hints(question, k=10, max_tokens=None)[source]

Get hints from the current index for the given question.

Parameters:

  • question (str) – A string representing the user question.

  • k (int) – The number of most similar messages to include from the index.

  • max_tokens (int | None) – The maximum number of tokens to be retrieved from the index.

Returns:

A string representing the hint prompt with the question.

Return type:

str

set_current_index(index_name)[source]

Set the current index to be used for hints.

Parameters:

index_name (str | None) – A string representing the index name or None to clear the current index.

Raises:

ValueError – If the provided index name is not available.

Return type:

None
